label:
The overall life expectancy in Cambridgeshire at birth in 1990 (for males and females combined) was 77.5 years.

On average, a person born in this year could expect to live 67.2 years in good health but spend 10.3 years living with at least some level of disability or ill health.

This means living around 13.3% of life with an illness or disability.
